name: SimpleRegistry
tag_list: cash-registry, wedding-registry, registry, baby-registry, honeymoon-registry, life-event-registry, fundraising-registry, registry-scanner, mobile-scanner
overview:
The perfect gift registry (really). Get creative - put anything you can find or think of on one (awesome) registry.

SimpleRegistry is similar to a traditional registry in which you register for the individual gifts you would like to receive. However, with SimpleRegistry, anything you can think of and assign a cost to can be added to your registry. In one-click, use the SimpleAdder to add any item on any site to your registry. Also use the free SimpleRegistry mobile app to scan the barcode or take a snapshot of any item in any store and add it to your registry. If you have trouble coming up with great items to register, let your friends & family recommend items they love with our Item Suggestions feature.

Easily build your registry with items, activities, and experiences you’d like to receive and guests contribute monetary gifts towards them. You can also split expensive gifts into any sized portions you wish to make group giving easy.

As you receive monetary gifts, redeem them as often as you would like. Instead of sending you the actual gifts, we send you a bank check or bank transfer so you can personally purchase the items, activities, and experiences whenever and from wherever you choose!

funding_rounds.source_description: SimpleRegistry Gets Gift Of Seed Funding From CincyTech
